name: officedev-copilot-for-m365-plugins-samples-msgext-northwind-inventory-action-csharp
title: Northwind Inventory plugin for Microsoft 365 Copilot
shortDescription: This sample implements a Teams message extension that can be used as a plugin for Microsoft 365 Copilot.
longDescription: This sample implements a Teams message extension that can be used as a plugin for Microsoft 365 Copilot. The message extension allows users to query the Northwind Database

thumbnails.alt: Screenshot of the sample extension working in Copilot in Microsoft Teams

references.name: Extend Microsoft 365 Copilot
references.description: Learn more about how to extend Microsoft 365 Copilot

references.name: Teams Toolkit for Visual Studio
references.description: Learn more about the Teams Toolkit for Visual Studio.
